title: Twitter Tries Calming Employees as Deal With Elon Musk Looms
description: With Mr. Musk’s $44 billion deal to buy Twitter set to close no later than Oct. 28, the company is trying to reassure workers about their employment and compensation.
dc:creator: Kate Conger, Ryan Mac and Lauren Hirsch
media:credit: Jason Henry for The New York Times
media:description: Twitter’s headquarters in San Francisco. For months, the company’s 7,500 employees have worried how Elon Musk may change the service.
